txt.en: 'Why does Guthfinn want us to help these primitive stone-giants? I feel uneasy here.'
'Recruit them as allies? We could make use of their strength, but what could we offer them?'
'They seem to be content to play their foolish games, and to live as savages.'
'Helf? The one carrying that tremendous egg? Trouble will follow; the eagles will not be fond of his actions.'
'Look out!'
'Intruders!'
'Have you not seen their size? They would be a most powerful ally for the Dourhand.'
'They have ignored our past offers, but the giant Helf has asked Guthfinn for protection. This is our opportunity!'
'Come for the egg have you? You will never take it from me.'
'TBD Giant Intro 2'
'Care to test why Helf entrusts the Dourhand as allies? Come with me. You will witness our cunning and strength!'
'Catch!'
'To me, my brothers! Come forth brawlers!'
'Proceed with your stomping and boulder catching for now, I must test the mettle of our would be intruders.'
'Watch! I throw this rock!'
'Let us begin!'
'Skarfr! Nollarr! Ingim√°rr! Listen to my orders, brothers!'
'Heave!'
'Hit the [placeholder] [placeholder] with a rock! That is how to win this game.'
'I am strongest!'
'Don't stand still, giants! Run about if you don't wish to lose!'
'I will be the winner, brothers!'
'Look how high it goes!'
'Crash down like thunder!'
'I am the greatest hurler, brothers!'
'With all my strength!'
'Hurrr!'
The first gate has opened
Guthfinn and his minions have been defeated
The gate to Helf's home has been opened
Helf has been defeated
The egg has been destroyed
'Stay away from our livestock!'
'Drive back the intruders!'
The stone-giant, Helf, has stolen the egg of a great eagle. He has retreated back to the safety of his mountain home upon Iorbar's Peak, where he plans to make the egg into his next meal.
The egg has become slightly damaged
The egg has become fully cracked. You have failed to protect it
'Dourhand powder-workers have begun moving towards the egg'
'Wake me when it is time to eat....'
Sled
'You are too weak! The egg will suffer for it!'
Lord Gwaihir has arrived to retrieve the egg
Egg Damage Status
'You worry too much. Even the eagles would not dare to attack the stone-giants on their territory.'
Ascend the mountain to the first gate
'It seems you have won the game. Go on then, we must rest.'
Defeat Guthfinn and his minions
'The game has ended? I rather enjoyed it. Off you go, now.'
Ascend the mountain to enter Helf's home
'Thank you for keeping safe this egg. I am in your debt, friends.'
Defeat Helf and secure the great eagle egg
'I will take the egg back to the eyrie. You had better begin your descent before more giants arrive.'
Do not allow the egg to be destoryed
'May we speak again in less harsh conditions. Safe journeys.'
'Send reinforcements! I am in need of a mender!'
'Aid me, my allies! Summon forth the shadows! Mend my wounds!'
'To my side! Come brute and shadow-caller!'
'You dare to attack our pets?'
'Should you reach the summit, do you truly hope to survive against my wrath?'
'Come, my allies! Crack the egg at all costs!'
'Your journey ends here, little worms. The egg is mine, you will not take it from me!'
'Your little annoyances are no longer amusing to me. How dare you interrupt my supper?'
'Bothersome insects! Stay away from my egg!'
'Curse the eagles and their allies! You cannot defeat me!'
The egg has become greatly damaged
'Ahaha! Crack the egg! Careless fools!'
'Ahaha! You have failed. I have broken through the egg!'
The dangerous snow covered paths twist up the mountain side in front of you.\n\nYou have begun seeking the current location of the egg, stolen by the giant Helf from the eagles.
'I have new rules for your game. Heed my commands, for there can be but one winner... and to he goes the glory!'
The Dourhand leader, Guthfinn, prevents your passage beyond the next gate.\n\nGuthfinn has fooled the stone-giants into helping him stop your advance up the mountian trails.

The gate beyond the stone-giant structures has been opened, allowing you to continue along the trail.\n\nWith Guthfinn defeated, and the stone-giant games ended, you are free to proceed along the path to Helf and the egg.
Helf awaits your arrival upon the summit of Iorbar's peak.\n\nThe gates have been opened to the summit at the end of the path. Helf is expecting you, and the eagle egg cannot be far away.
'Giants, prove your strength. Throw your boulders high into the air!'
'Turn back now, puny ones, or this mountain will become your grave.'
'We won't let them past! But please don't hit us with those boulders!'
'We cannot fight for you if we are crushed under rocks!'
'For you, little ones!'
'Watch your head! Ahaha!'
'Leave now, fools!'
'Have another!'
'Your progress so far means nothing. The egg will remain with me!'
'Hrmph. All of this talk is making me hungry. I go now to prepare my supper. Ahaha!'
Iorbar's Peak - Tier 1
'Hoompf!'
'We do not want to fight, Guthfinn. We want to play our game!'
